name: Fibula Project
description: Fibula Project is a faithful recreation of the classic Tibia 7.1 experience. Our server aims to bring back the nostalgia of old-school Tibia while maintaining an active and friendly community. We focus on authentic gameplay, balanced rates, and regular updates to ensure the best possible experience for our players.
additional_info:
Project Fibula is a recreation of early Tibia's spirit, with certain features from future versions introduced where necessary to make it stable, fair, and engaging for a modern audience. The game has been designed to feel like early Tibia in many ways; however, it is not an exact replica.

Each phase of the project revisits a chapter of Tibia's evolution, exploring how the game's world, balance, and mechanics changed over time.

The server is powered by The Violet Project - a closed-source, forked version of The Forgotten Server - which has been designed to emulate as many classic features of Tibia as possible.
